name: H-ART S.R.L.
description: H-ART S.R.L. was an Italian web agency acquired by AKQA, fully merged in 2017. They offered services such as experience design, data science, lean consulting, content marketing, open innovation, and digital marketing. The current entity operates as Hart Studio, a digital agency focused on innovation in corporate and retail sectors, providing UX/UI design, app and website development, video content production, brand identity design, interactive solutions, and event light/video mapping.
services: App development for iOS and Android
Video content production, editing, and motion graphics
Light and video mapping for events
Drone filming (certified for A1/A2 and A3 operations)
history: H-ART was acquired by AKQA in 2015 and fully merged in 2017. The CEO expressed excitement about the merger enabling new global opportunities.
notes: Hart Studio emphasizes a human-centered approach and innovation, blending physical and digital spaces to enhance brand perception.
